services.title: What We Do for Orphans in Israel

s1.title: Financial and Educational Assistance
s1.text: Scholarships, tuition assistance, funding for courses and training. We ensure that financial barriers do not stop dreams.

s2.title: Emotional and Psychological Support
s2.text: Professional guidance, support groups, emotional therapy, and empowerment workshops. A safe place for growth and healing.

s3.title: Mentorship and Guidance
s3.text: Connection to personal mentors, career guidance, and professional direction. A supportive adult for every orphan.

s4.title: Rights Realization
s4.text: Assistance in obtaining benefits, legal guidance, and representation מול authorities. We ensure full realization of rights.

s5.title: Community and Belonging
s5.text: Social gatherings, camps, trips, and clubs. Building a supportive community and lifelong connections.

s6.title: Housing and Foster Families
s6.text: Assistance in finding foster families, adoption support, and housing assistance. No child will be left without a warm home.

story.title: Personal Story: A Voice from the Field
story.p1: "When my father passed away, I was 14 and didn’t know where to turn. Mishpacha didn’t just help me financially – they gave me a second family. My mentor, Danny, was there every step of the way, helped me cope with the pain and believe in myself again. Today I am studying engineering, and I know I wouldn’t be here without them."
